attributes.action: make a statement to Parliament about what he expects savers to do with their money because they are suffering under his fiscal stimulus plans,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Interest rates on savings are at record lows - in fact negative in real terms. Reckless lending caused the credit problems we are facing now, but it seems that those who've been sensible with their money are being punished. The theme from Government is that we should spend. I would like to know whether the PM is in favour of savers or not.
